General.Name: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited
General.Description: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, hospitality, and related businesses in Thailand. It offers a portfolio of properties to guests in the Republic of Maldives, the Republic of Fiji, the Republic of Mauritius, the United Kingdom, and Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Singha Estate Public Company Limited.
